author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HUMBERTO EXPECTED TO PRODUCE DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS FOR BERMUDA AND MOST OF THE U.S. EAST COAST THIS WEEK... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE IN BERMUDA ON TUESDAY...
summary: ...HUMBERTO EXPECTED TO PRODUCE DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS FOR BERMUDA AND MOST OF THE U.S. EAST COAST THIS WEEK... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE IN BERMUDA ON TUESDAY... As of 2:00 PM AST Mon Sep 29 the center of Humberto was located near 28.5, -67.9 with movement NNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 942 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HUMBERTO EXPECTED TO PRODUCE DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS FOR BERMUDA AND MOST OF THE U.S. EAST COAST THIS WEEK... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE IN BERMUDA ON TUESDAY... As of 2:00 PM AST Mon Sep 29 the center of Humberto was located near 28.5, -67.9 with movement NNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 942 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Humberto (AT3/AL082025)
